ygData.subject: Re: New patch "features"
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The way I read the patch message, we get the meditate skill at level 10 automatically (no need to train it).  But if you re playing and go from level 9 to
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 20 Jan 2000, Bill Mann wrote:
>
> Well, the Meditate skill is pretty sweet. Didn't even have to zone for it
> to work (read somewhere that we would have to zone for it to kick in the

The way I read the patch message, we get the meditate skill at
level 10 automatically (no need to train it). But if you're
playing and go from level 9 to 10, you will need to zone
before it starts working. If you're already past level 10
then you got it when you logged in.

> Anyone else notice any other hidden things?

Mob behavior seems to have changed in many areas. There were
a lot more corpses than I'm used to seeing.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
